sentence: Finally, a signal! I’ve been trying to get to an area with phone signal forever!
Now that I can communicate I need some help, friend!
I’ve been in the rebel controlled areas, where we’re cut off from aid and get regular bombardment.
There’s a rumor that the international community is helping Bashir to "control migration" - can you confirm if it’s true?
This is messed up! Support for Bashir means bad news for us. I need to get my family out of here.
Help me figure out the best route to escape!!
3. Stay in Nuba Mountains, South Kordofan, Sudan
Good call! I'll give it a try! It's a long walk... I also heard that they are moving everybody there. I'll write you when I arrive.
If you have any friends that might be able to help me, please give them my contact: @Kuku_bot

We just got picked up by security services on our way to Khartoum. They are claiming we are SPLM-N rebel members and threatening to take us to court to face charges. You just helped hand us over to the system!
We stayed and the now bombing increased. We’re alive but we’re dodging bombardment and scraping to get food. I had to leave the area to send this message - pray for us
